description: Provides the ability to submit a full Interest Restriction Return (IRR) for the group

agentActingOnBehalfOfCompany.description: Indicates if an Agency is acting on behalf of the Reporting Company for the group

agentName.description: The name of the Agency that is acting on behalf of the company. Required if 'agentActingOnBehalfOfCompany' is 'true'

reportingCompany.description: Details of the appointed reporting company that is submitting this return on behalf of the group

ctutr.description: Corporation Tax Unique Taxpayer Reference (CTUTR) number

sameAsUltimateParent.description: Indicate whether the reporting company is the same as the ultimate parent

parentCompany.description: Details of the parent company, this can be either an ultimate parent company or a deemed parent

ultimateParent.description: Details of the ultimate parent company

ctutr.description: Corporation Tax Unique Taxpayer Reference (CTUTR) number

deemedParent.description: Details of the deemed parent companies

ctutr.description: Corporation Tax Unique Taxpayer Reference (CTUTR) number

publicInfrastructure.description: Indicate if any of the companies has made a qualifying infrastructure company (QIC) election

totalCompanies.description: Total number of companies within the worldwide group

startDate.description: The start date of the accounting period

endDate.description: The end date of the accounting period

submissionType.description: Indicate whether this is the first (original) return or an amended (revised) return

revisedReturnDetails.description: A description of why the return is being amended, this is mandatory if the submissionType is 'revised'

returnContainsEstimates.description: Indicator for whether the return contains figures which are estimated

groupSubjectToInterestRestrictions.description: Indicator for whether the group is subject to interest restrictions

groupSubjectToInterestReactivation.description: Indicator for whether the group is subject to interest reactivations

groupLevelElections.description: Details of the calculation elections made by the group

isElected.description: Indicate if the group has elected to use the group ratio calculation. If this is false then fixed ratio is used
Indicate if the group has elected to use the group ratio blended calculation. Can only be elected if group ratio is elected

investorGroups.description: List the investor groups to which the group ratio blended election relates. Can only be supplied if group ratio blended is elected

elections.description: The elections made by this investor group

groupEBITDAChargeableGains.description: Indicate if the group has elected to use the group EBITDA chargeable gains election. Can only be elected if group ratio is elected

interestAllowanceAlternativeCalculation.description: Indicate if the group has elected to use the Interest Allowance Alternative Calculation election

isElected.description: Indicate if the group has elected to use the Interest Allowance Non-Consolidated Investment election
Indicate if the group has elected to use the Interest Allowance Consolidated Partnership election

ukCompanies.description: Details of all the UK Companies which form part of the group

ctutr.description: Corporation Tax Unique Taxpayer Reference (CTUTR) number

consenting.description: Indicate whether the company consenting to the return

qicElection.description: Indicate whether the company is accessing the Public Infrastructure Rules

netTaxInterestExpense.description: The Net Tax Interest Expense amount

netTaxInterestIncome.description: The Net Tax Interest Income amount

ap1EndDate.description: End date for the first Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances

ap2EndDate.description: End date for the second Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, if applicable. If supplied must be after ap1EndDate

ap3EndDate.description: End date for the third Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, if applicable. If supplied must be after ap2EndDate

disallowanceAp1.description: Amount for the first Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, must be supplied if ap1EndDate is supplied

disallowanceAp2.description: Amount for the second Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, must be supplied if ap2EndDate is supplied

disallowanceAp3.description: Amount for the third Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, must be supplied if ap3EndDate is supplied

totalDisallowances.description: Total of disallowanceAp1, disallowanceAp2 and disallowanceAp3

currentPeriodReactivation.description: Amount being reactivated for current period of account

taxEBITDA.description: Earnings Before Interest, Tax, Depreciation and Amortization (EBITDA) amount

interestAllowanceForPeriod.description: Interest Allowance used for this period

interestCapacityForPeriod.description: Interest Capacity for period to carry forward for future period

groupEBITDA.description: Earnings Before Interest, Tax, Depreciation and Amortization (EBITDA) amount

groupRatio.description: Percentage figure, capped at 100%. Should be calculated as the QNGIE divided by the EBITDA, if negative result then set to 100%

totalReactivation.description: Total of all allocated reactivations for each UK company

totalRestrictions.description: Total of all allocated restrictions for each UK company
